text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Administrator" means:
a person that is registered as an administrator under Title 8, Subtitle 3 of this article; or
a carrier as defined under subsection (d) of this section.
"Board" means the Board of Directors for the Maryland Health Insurance Plan.

"Carrier" means:
an authorized insurer that provides health insurance in the State;
a nonprofit health service plan that is licensed to operate in the State; or
a health maintenance organization that is licensed to operate in the State.
"Creditable coverage" has the meaning stated in § 15-1301 of this article.
"Eligible individual" has the meaning stated in § 15-1301 of this article.
"Fund" means the Maryland Health Insurance Plan Fund.

"Medicare Part D coverage gap" means the gap in coverage under Medicare Part D:
above the initial coverage limit and before catastrophic coverage begins; and
during which an individual enrolled in Medicare Part D is responsible for 100% coinsurance costs.
"Plan" means the Maryland Health Insurance Plan.
"Plan of operation" means the articles, bylaws, and operating rules and procedures adopted by the Board in accordance with § 14-503 of this subtitle.
